attributes.action: Stop abusing your position by continuously removing the rights to freedom and privacy of individual citizens, through the "War on Terror"!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The actions of the government throughout this war on "terror" is criminalizing the majority of innocent citizens, infringing on our rights to privacy, freedom and independence. And we are being bombarded with "terror alerts" that stir up disproportionate and unnecessary fears. Also excessive and overbearing restrictions do not guarantee security, but rather is taking away rights that we as a people are not prepared to surrender.

rejection.details: It is not clear what you are requesting the government do. Your petition's title should be a clear call to action relating to a particular aspect of government, or government policy. Please reword your petition and resubmit.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
